name: Square Game
imgAltText: a square fighting a 2D dragon, in black and white
text: Short single-player platformer made solo in Unity with C#.
Play as a square on a quest for the legendary DASH ability. Collect ATTACKs (they go 'pew'!), destroy your enemies, fight a dragon, and make conversation with one (1) dubiously friendly local.

name: Management Website
imgAltText: a company management website's project page for a company's team #1
text: Full-stack website for managing generic companies, made with Spring, Java, PostgreSQL, Angular, Typescript, HTML, and CSS.
On the team, I worked on both backend and frontend functionality.
For the backend, I wrote Java functions to retrieve, create, delete, and edit employee data in the PostgreSQL database.
For the frontend, I collaborated on the 'Projects' and 'Teams' pages, writing calls in Typescript to send, request, interpret, and display data from the server.

name: Social Media API
text: Social media API made with Spring, Java, and PostgreSQL.
On the team, I developed and implemented the user profile class and its database relationships, and I handled tweet context (a tweet's full reply chain) and hashtag retrieval from the server.

name: The Oof Rooms
imgAltText: cover art for the oof rooms visual novel, featuring each friendly character in the game
text: Visual novel made in Unity with C#.
Play as a disaffected office worker whisked away to a magical corporation where all of your coworkers are friendly.

I was the programmer of the team, as well as the team member in charge of using Unity as a whole. I handled implementing the three minigames, the shaders and animations, the save/load system, and the dialogue system, which supports branching choices and per-line art and sound transitions.

name: Lunar Restoration: The Plague of Time
imgAltText: cover art for the lunar restoration puzzle game
text: Puzzle game made in Unity with C# for a game jam.
I was the team programmer, as well as the team member in charge of using Unity. I coded the gameplay, animations, menus, and high score board.
